title: Flipped Learning-Based Social Leadership Competency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Social sector leadership training for administrators conducted in a BYOD environment

learning_goals: Learners can explain 90% or more of core social leadership concepts (knowledge base) by analyzing pre-learning materials in a flipped learning environment.
Learners achieve 80% of integrated thinking skills (integrated domain) while solving real-world application problems through group collaboration.
Learners implement 75% or more of human communication strategies (human dimension) based on peer feedback through individual activities.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
